extendedInfo.description: Live motion War scene as a background on your phone like nothing you have ever seen before!War Scene Aftermath Live Wallpaper is sure to impress!The Apocalyptic nightmare comes alive on your smart phone as a live wallpaper in 3D on your smart phone.Armageddon is upon us.  Where will you be when the life altering experience begins?Best of all this Nuclear War Scene Aftermath Live Wallpaper is absolutely FREE.Install this Apocalypse live motion wallpaper app today.Watch the nuclear Apocalypse come alive on your smart phone. We do contain advertisements in this app so that we can have the ability to give these realistic applications away absolutely free!You can optout notification ads from:Airpush Optout: http://www.airpush.com/optoutSendDroid Optout: http://senddroid.com/opt-out/every mobile landing page that the user is directed to has an "unsubscribe" link at the bottom, which opts-out a user with a single click.
